threat: An attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user invoking Firefox.

If a user were tricked into viewing a malicious site, an attacker could potentially view image data from a different site.

An attacker could potentially use this to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user invoking Firefox.
If a user were tricked into viewing a malicious site, an attacker could possibly trick the user into installing a malicious addon or theme.
An attacker could utilize this to perform cross-site scripting attacks.
